website_summaries.verdict: The go-to choice for teens and whimsical adults alike, this favored bungee chair is sure to spruce up any room.
pros: Attractive teal cords work well in spaces needing colorful decor
Can adequately hold adults of all ages, heights, and sizes
cons: A few children lighter than 100 pounds may not weigh enough to keep the cords down

customer_reviews.title: This is a really cool chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair! My son and my cat love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: I never want to leave this chair
customer_reviews.text: Day 56. Chair is so comfortable I never had to move. Knees weak. Arms spaghetti. All I do is bounce when I'm bored and it entertains me until I fall asleep. I haven't seen sunlight in days. I have no friends because of this chair, or not having any to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lowther

customer_reviews.title: COMFY!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It's not really my style, but it's so comfy I have it out on the porch anyway. This is my second Bunjo. The first one lasted about 2 years on the balcony. Then the bunjee cords started to rip a bit. So I got a new one when I moved and I just love it. Comfy AF!
customer_reviews.author: Procter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use while at her swim meets. There is a lot of waiting around, so this chair is perfect. The only problem...getting other kids out of the chair while she is not in it. Everyone that sits in it loves it. It is very comfortable - I usually place a towel or blanket over it, but that is just me. We have had it for a month and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Fun Quality Chair!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this chair, in fact he sleeps in it every night, with his feet on his bed! Very comfortable, durable and fun for gamers! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair, back support is great. when it's hot, it's nice and airy. Color is awesome. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lynn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought for my granddaughter ( age 11) when she got straight A’s this last semester. She loves it! Perfect for her room. Folds for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: sinfulpuddin

customer_reviews.title: Broke within the first month
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to buy this and it was a huge hit in the house. It’s a conversation starter and just a really cool chair. However, it isn’t very durable. One day one of the screws came out, but they aren’t actually screws just metal bars so I couldn’t just screw it back in. My child was devastated and now I have to buy another chair. I do love the concept of this chair, but it just isn’t very well made unfortunately. I’d steer clear of this, unless you just want a novelty item that won’t last long. Super unfortunate, especially for the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Semaj

customer_reviews.title: Chair seems to appeal to a younger crowd, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair seems to appeal to a younger crowd, but you need to weigh as much as an adult (at least 130lbs) for it to work properly. My daughter loves the idea of the chair we got her, but she doesn't weigh enough and slides off it instead of sitting "in" it. She weighs 67lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora123

customer_reviews.title: Fabric rubs off on walls
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair, but the fabric on the frame of the chair is similar to a canvas and it keeps making heavy, dark black marks on our newly painted walls. I have had to tell my kids not to sit in the chair anywhere near a wall for fear that it will wreck the walls. Right now, I have the chair completely covered with a blanket so it doesn't continue to rub the black ink or whatever it is onto the walls. I'm wondering if there is any type of cover for this chair to prevent this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty novel chair
customer_reviews.text: Pretty novel chair. Bought for my daughters. They liked it for a while, but quickly became uncomfortable to them. Went from a bedroom chair to a cat toy within a month. Not the chair's fault mind you, I may have picky children.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Paranormal Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter who weighs approximately 50 lbs. She slides right off as the bands are tight and she does not weigh enough for this to work as a chair for her. Fine for an adult or someone weighing twice as much. Should come with a minimum weight suggestion of 75 lbs or more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gates-Striby

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and comfy. I keep this in my office for relaxing break time when I just need one minute away from my desk. I wish the strings could loosen up more, but I guess I just have to wait until it's more "worn out" so it's not so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for kids/young teens
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a gaming/ lounge chair. He really likes it alot! He says its very comfortable. For reference he is 5’4” 130 lbs and the chair holds him well. I would NOT recommend it for anyone over 200lbs. My husband won’t dare sit in it because he is afraid a bunjee will snap. But a great chair for kids/teens/young adults!! Don’t know how long it will last but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my balcony. Great quality and durability. I'm 8 months pregnant and can sit comfortably without any issue in the chair. My husband also loves them, so added bonus. Color is great and handles weight easily without you feeling like it's going to bust at any moment leaving you humiliated and with a sore backside.
customer_reviews.author: Casie Justus

customer_reviews.title: Used this chair for over a year and works great with adults and children alike
customer_reviews.text: Used this chair for over a year and works great with adults and children alike. -1 star for the design concerning your neck.. you cannot sit long (maybe 1/2 hr) when sitting fully back in the chair. your body sinks into the chair but the top bar create uncomfortable neck position (even with blanketed padding). We love to use this chair after workouts so that we have something to sit and rest before going straight to a shower.
customer_reviews.author: sc0rch3d

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, very comfortable! I have to put a blanket over it if I'm wearing shorts so the bungee cords don't cut into my legs, but other than that it's great. I love the way it folds up for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Carsen

customer_reviews.title: Received different color then shown
customer_reviews.text: Recieved product today and it looks nothing like the picture does totally different colors
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great except the size
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than expected but otherwise great. The kids love it. It's made a cozy reading chair for them and it's REALLY sturdy. I wish it would have been larger so it fit our teens better, but it's overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: mehimandourfive

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort! Only one flaw away from perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the new family favorite! It’s so comfortable.c and so portable, and looks slick enough to be a fixture in any room in our house. But the flaw in the design is that the (bottom 3) grommets started to tear off of the sturdy fabric within months of the original purchase. The weight limit says 225lbs and we do not have anyone close to that weight in our house. I have installed zip-ties to reinforce the grommets temporarily, and that seems to be working, although it looks janky.
customer_reviews.author: banjostud

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This was on our Granddaughter's Christmas list, (she called it a spider web chair). When she opened it up on Christmas morning, her eyes got big! She loved the color - and bounced in and out of it for quite a while. Sturdy, already assembled and an all-around great chair!! (Strong enough for adults to enjoy as well!)
customer_reviews.author: U-Dub Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good chair; doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Update: Broke completely within a year: not durable Was comfortable at first. Now my butt touches the floor every time I sit down. I am not a heavy man. Definitely not a long-term seating solution but it's fine for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a chair you can sit in for any length of time. Need to cushion with a blanket, comforter, or pillow as the rope cuts into your body.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, Sweet gaming chair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gaming chair or just for watching television. My son ordered one for himself and I actually turned right around and ordered one for myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: SavingPenniesMakesDollars

customer_reviews.title: Virtual learning must
customer_reviews.text: Preteen daughter doing virtual school loves it to get her wiggles out has also been using it to play Xbox she wiggles and bounces it’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick for tween
customer_reviews.text: 12 year old likes it! Moved in front of woodstove during social distancing, she reads in. Not my fave, smaller person only
customer_reviews.author: Mom_in_New_England

customer_reviews.title: Now the teenager will never move
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. Easy to setup, and it's great that you can fold it and store it when not in use. However, he's a little too comfortable and I fear he may never leave the basement.
customer_reviews.author: MichA

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy, for a teenager or adult. I purchased for my nine year old and she doesn’t weigh enough to make it go down so she looks like she is just laying back and will slide off instead of actually sitting
customer_reviews.author: Franscine M Whitehouse

customer_reviews.title: We tested it and it holds 210 lbs so far (but it's not as comfortable with more weight)
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son picked out this chair for his bedroom. He loves it!! We tested it and it holds 210 lbs so far (but it's not as comfortable with more weight). It's perfect as a fun, lightweight chair that can easily be stored under the bed
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great chair bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product! Only reason I’ve given it 4 stars is because the packaging arrived damaged and the box open. I did reach out to the seller and they handled the situation very well we are happy with the service. In terms of the chair the bungee part is very durable thick material holds up well, the locking mechanism works well to fold the chair and the color is nice and bright!
customer_reviews.author: ZuZu

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking comfy bouncy teen chair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all ages and gives the opportunity to bounce like a baby , or with a baby. Quite comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Extended Mima

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter for Christmas, she only weighs about 80 pounds. The material ripped in two places making the chair unusable a little after a month of use (just after return policy ran out). Don't know if this is common, but it is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wix

customer_reviews.title: COMFY
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this chair for her birthday. She LOVES it. It is very comfortable and durable. It looks great in her room and all of her friends love it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille H.

customer_reviews.title: I disagree with the one review about not good for an adult
customer_reviews.text: I disagree with the one review about not good for an adult. I say the complete opposite. I bought the chair for my 16 year old son and my mom who is 65 has back issues, especially in the tailbone region, and she sat in the chair and it has been comfort for her ever since. It relieves the pressure off her back and it is very easy for her to get out of, she just bounces out! She even uses it in her living room. The only down fall is I purchased one last year for my son and paid $53, this year I went to go buy my mom her own and the price is at $79
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very good quality. It’s sturdy and seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole0313

customer_reviews.title: Relaxation with a bounce
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my son, and he loves it. Perfect for a growing boy that has a hard time sitting still. Comfortable and doesn’t take up much space
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine yesterday. So far I LOVE it! Super comfy. I don't sink down too far just yet, but it should break in after some time. Perfect for reading. I just haven't figured out how to fold it back up again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fisherman's net?
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my granddaughter who loved it! She is feeling her room in a ocean theme and this reminded her of a net.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Bungee Dish Chair arrived on time and is liked very much by my eleven year old grandchild
customer_reviews.text: Bungee Dish Chair arrived on time and is liked very much by my eleven year old grandchild. It is made well and is said to support a 225 pound person which is a plus and will add longevity to the chair.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: I was worried it was going to be too small and that the circle shape would be uncomfortable but it is comfortable for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My middle school-er loves this chair, when friends come over everyone wants to sit in it. I was worried it was going to be too small and that the circle shape would be uncomfortable but it is comfortable for the kids. My child is 5'2'' 105 lbs and it is a good fit. It is well made and the color is really nice. This is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaMom

customer_reviews.title: It is great for a 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for her birthday. It is great for a 11 year old. Would not recommend this for someone who is older or can not get out of a chair easy. It is made well but it will stretch. She can bounce in it and make it go most of the way to the ground. Folds up flat and is great for traveling for the young!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa R. Acquard

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: As an adult this chair is uncomfortable because the netting is very firm doesn’t give but my young kids like to bounce in it or play with it - note it is very tight - very sturdy, very well made
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: A Most Excellent Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great Chair! Believe it or not, it's more comfortable than one might think and it's fun too! Definitely would recommend this anyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing chairs! Just buy it and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: My favorite fun chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair about 2/3 years ago and still have it! It has held up beautifully 😊
customer_reviews.author: Karmasixx

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair!
customer_reviews.text: I will agree with other reviews - this makes an excellent cat toy. Not the most comfortable chair I've used but not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs from our 14-year-old
customer_reviews.text: We bought the bungee chair for our 14-year-old son for Christmas. He loves it; and so do his younger sisters! In fact he can’t get them out of it half the time. The chair has held up well to all the use. No complaints and cool color.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my 9 year old granddaughter. She loves it and it is holding up well after a month of her sitting and bouncing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kessell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I got it so I would have a reading chair that I could put away when I am not using it. It's folds easily and is very comfortable. I have had people that this chair becomes even more comfortable once it has been broken in more. I am very pleased with this purchase. It also arrived earlier then expected with was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome chair! love it. would like to eventually buy another for our livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this chair. It was exactly what she wanted. And it's big enough that an adult can lounge in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it for reading, tv, outside. Even 200 lb. brothers can sit in it. Folds up easily and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Steveo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, awesome colors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her 8th Birthday. She had been asking for one for some time but I was hoping to find her something that not everyone had. I definitely think I did good. She loves the color and I haven't seen anyone else toting a chair like this around. I find myself sitting in it as well, it's pretty comfy!
customer_reviews.author: LadyNobilis

customer_reviews.title: Teal Bunjo a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This chair was a gift for my 10 yr. old niece and she loves it! She has it in her bedroom. It is now her favorite comfortable place to sit and read!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: bungee chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kids. They like the chair. So far it is serving its purpose. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Snider

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 dorm essential
customer_reviews.text: Me and my roommate both got a bungee chair of sort(i got this one), and my has stood the test of time significantly better. It has not loosened up yet, and it very comfortable. definitely an essential dorm room item. Folds and and does take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Kely

customer_reviews.title: Cool chair!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool chair. My teenage daughter sits in it when she plays her video games. She likes it as is, but also likes to throw a small blanket over it and sit on that - makes it more comfy for her AND the pets who want to sit with her - their little feeties don't fall through the bungees. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: we all love this chair.
customer_reviews.text: we all love this chair. bought it for my daughter, but its so comfy, so my husband and i both use it too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kozlowski

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair. It’s in her little reading nook. A little bigger than what I thought it would be, but measured true to description.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: It appeared to have good workmanship. Day before Christmas I was disappointed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived in correct color. It appeared to have good workmanship. Day before Christmas I was disappointed to find same chair at Target for $15.00.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: My tween loves this chair. Its sturdy enough that she and her sister can both sit on it and folds away easily when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy grandson enjoys it for a reading spot and game playing. Very sturdy and nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my 10 year old grandson for his very own chair for his bedroom. He is thrilled. Perfect little boy chair! Great product that is holding up well and being used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Msemcee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Chair
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my grand daughter, she loves it! I was amazed at the Quality of this chair and how comfortable it really is. I may have to buy a few more just for my house. Also super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie N.

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic chair for camping
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic chair for camping. The kids loved it on our recent 4th of July trip where I was at the end of my 2nd trimester. its great because it helps you out of the chair...not so easy to do with most camping chairs when you're pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: neem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave to granddaughter as a birthday gift, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: A fun and solid chair
customer_reviews.text: My fourteen year old son loves this chair. It's fairly high quality, functional and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got both of my grandchildren a chair. They love them. Seems like they are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bouncy, bungee fun in a chair. Puts a whole new spin on camping accessories. Much more comfortable than a traditional camp chair. It folds easily and lies flat. Great extra seat when the gamers are over!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing! I am in my 20s and enjoy sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my little sister who is 12 for Christmas. It is amazing! I am in my 20s and enjoy sitting in it (when she allows me). The Bunjo chair is perfect for her bedroom or any dorm room. It is very durable, sturdy, and we loved the colors. Perfect for watching movies, sitting around, or if you are like me, doing paperwork. I highly recommend this chair compared to others we have tried or bean bag chairs.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair! She's 8, she reads in it, hangs with her friends, etc. It's exactly what she was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair for my son
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time, it fits under the bed when not in use, it holds up to my son and even myself (dad) when playing around in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 9 year old granddaughter. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 year old granddaughter. She loves it. Her 13 yo brother also likes to sit in it which occasionally causes arguments LOL. Well made has held up well with some abuse.
customer_reviews.author: V. Teel

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Rope is too tight. Makes for a slightly uncomfortable sit for something that looks like it should be super comfortable. I would take a pass. Want to buy mine?
customer_reviews.author: Ziffrus

customer_reviews.title: im very satisfied with my purchase of these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I got these chairs for my daughters and they loved them. These chairs are just what I wanted for them. They don't take up too much space. I love the design and color. Great prize.
customer_reviews.author: solnel

customer_reviews.title: he loves it and it's actually very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This was what my 14-year old son wanted...he loves it and it's actually very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: jmss

customer_reviews.title: I love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They are so comfortable for social visits, outdoor events, or just to relax on the porch. I like them for star gazing with a pillow and a blanket. And maybe a footstool of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E Vitez

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with product!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter's 15th birthday... she LOVES it. it really is a nice quality, sharp color and design and fits well in her room. My father in law loved it so much, he bought another version for himself!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 30 days, and terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The bungee cord snapped after having the chair for only a month. The child using the chair was only 125 lbs. Attempts were made to contact Champion Values to exchange the chair and they said I had to go directly to the manufacturer after 30 days. The manufacturer stated they have nothing to do with returns/exchanges and that it had to be handled by the company it was purchased from. So it was a big waste of money to have a chair for 30 days, and horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and it’s strong and can hold adults too
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Decent Chairs, Poor Reinforcement
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my special education classroom. They are great chairs, good chords and reinforced grommets however, within two weeks the grommets were pulling away from the fabric. Still the best bungee chairs I have purchased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Larin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 12 year old and all the adults wanted one too! Really neat and comfortable chair, easy to get out of too!
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: Fun chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for a teen's bedroom or college student.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's Christmas Gift was a success
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old got this for Christmas and just loves it! She can sit it in and rest her head back on the back of the chair with no problem. She tried to sleep in it and didn't work all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my teenage niece who had requested it. I thought it was the craziest chair ever. But she loved it then and still loves it now...sits in it all the time! Says it super comfy...
customer_reviews.author: Hartless Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for anything
customer_reviews.text: Hold very well, easy to get out of, value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone 💚 This chair, including me...a 35 year old mama of 4. It is wonderful for putting infants to sleep by cuddling and gently bouncing. I will be purchasing another for myself to keep to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W May

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect, been using it all day. Perfect size and everything. If you’re debating on buying, do it. Great addition to any gaming room.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 12 year old for under his loft bed. It is his favorite place to sit. Very comfortable, even for an adult. He's been using it about 6 months, and it is holding up well. Sturdy chair, fold easily for on-the-go. Will be taking this to baseball games next summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Her mom loves it too because it is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and she just loves it. Her mom loves it too because it is so comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dicker

customer_reviews.title: Fun and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pre-teen granddaughter's room. She finds it fun and colorful and it's durability allows her to bounce some of that energy of hers.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda S. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: nice seat
customer_reviews.text: it has stood up to 2 teenagers falling in to it now for a while and still going, good buy
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Her Mom even tried it & said she really liked it! Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for Granddaughter & she went nuts the minute she saw what it was. Sat in it the whole evening. Her Mom even tried it & said she really liked it! Very happy with the purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Maes

customer_reviews.title: Recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Has lasted me forever and my brothers sit in it who weigh 300 pounds and still hadn't break might get stretched out but great product.
customer_reviews.author: marah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedroom chair
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the imprint it leaves sometimes and I use it as a chair I can easily move around and put away in my room. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! More comfortable than you would think!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnston

customer_reviews.title: It comfy
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that if your a skinny person it takes FOREVER to break in to wher it really comfy
customer_reviews.author: Wendy
